articles.title: Neptune's Cooler Than We Thought! Astronomers Find Its Temperatures Underwent Rapid, Unexpected Changes in Past 20 Years | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Using ground-based telescopes, including the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope, an international team of astronomers tracked Neptune's atmospheric temperatures over a 17-year period. - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com

articles.description: "We continue to urge all countries to avoid major new transactions for Russian weapons systems, particularly in light of what Russia is doing to Ukraine," US Secretary of State Antony J Blinken said at a press conference after the India-US 2+2 meeting.

articles.title: Rajnath, Jaishankar meet Biden, other US leaders amid 2+2 talks: 'Privileged...' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India and the US on Monday kicked off the 2+2 ministerial dialogue to boost the strategic partnership between the two countries. The crucial 2+2 dialogue comes as Europe sees one of the worst wars in decades.
